Najah/Feline::

Feline used her comm link and asked to FZ "Will we cease the fire and 
come back to our base commander???"


Najah answered to FZ "How's that SSSSSir?, we can desssstroy them now 
and do you let them alive ssssir? OHHHHH pleassssse jusssst let me 
kill a litte bird that I ssssseee here... he mussssst be here some 
where... Pleasssse May I kill him???
